Room.Name: Pits of Doom - Red Level
Room.ShortDescription: This level of the Pits of Doom isn't called the Red Level for nothing.
Room.LongDescription: The Red Level is caked with the singed blood of past victims. The most dangerous and mean-tempered dragons dwell on this level and are always on the lookout for food. Since not very many people think about coming in here, they don't get to eat very often. Well, at least you now know that these dragons exist and they're not just some made-up fantasy. Whether or not you'll be able to tell anyone may be another story.
